Leila Shenna (Arabic; a mụrụ Morocco) bụ onye Morocco bụbu onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara na ihe nkiri karịsịa n'afọ ndị 1970.

A na-echetakarị ya na mba ndị na-asụ Bekee maka ọrụ ya dịka nwa agbọghọ Bond na ihe nkiri afọ 1979 Moonraker dịka onye na-elekọta ụgbọ elu ọjọọ. Otú ọ dị, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri afọ 1968 Remparts d'argile (nke e wepụtara na mbụ na Ịtali, e mechara wepụta ya na United States n'afọ 1970 n'okpuru aha Ramparts of Clay) nke Jean-Louis Bertucelli duziri, onye mmeri Palme D'or nke 1975 Chronique des années de braise nke Mohammed Lakhdar-Hamina duziri, yana ihe nkiri Algeria nke afọ 1982 Vent de sable, nke Lakhdar na-Hamina. E mere ihe nkiri abụọ mbụ na Algeria, nke atọ n'ọzara
O nwekwara obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri March or Die nke afọ 1977.

Ọ bụ nwa nwanne Malika Oufkir, onye dere Stolen Lives: Twenty Years In A Desert Jail, akụkọ banyere mgbalị igbu Eze Morocco nke afọ 1972 site n'aka nna ya (na nwanne nna Leila), General Mohamed Oufkir.
